name: Acoustic Guitar
description: This acoustic guitar produces a warm and resonant sound that is perfect for both beginners and experienced players. It features a solid spruce top and mahogany back and sides.

name: Electric Guitar
description: This electric guitar offers a sleek design and powerful sound. It comes with a maple neck, rosewood fretboard, and dual humbucking pickups for a versatile tone.

name: Bass Guitar
description: This bass guitar provides deep and rich tones, ideal for both live performances and studio recordings. It features a solid alder body and a smooth maple neck.

name: Classical Guitar
description: This classical guitar is perfect for traditional and flamenco styles. It has a solid cedar top and rosewood back and sides, offering a rich and full-bodied sound.

name: Twelve-String Guitar
description: This twelve-string guitar produces a shimmering and chorus-like effect. It features a solid spruce top and maple back and sides, making it ideal for both strumming and fingerpicking.
